title: Sri Lanka apparel exporters teach EU due diligence rules to rubber, tea exporters
byline: EU policies, such as the deforestation regulation, will impact other Sri Lankan exports like rubber and timber.

title: Sri Lanka's WindForce to offer 3-pct voting stock in employee share option scheme
byline: WindForce said it was planning to offer 40,523,068 ordinary voting shares in an employee share option scheme

title: Sri Lanka's Seylan Bank net up 20-pct in June
byline: Lower provisions net interest income down

title: Sri Lanka rupee stronger against dollar, bonds steady
byline: An auction of 92,500 rupees of treasury bills was ongoing.

title: Tsunami warning issued to Russia, Pacific islands, South America on 8.7M quake
byline: 8.7 magnitude quake off Russia - No alert for Indian Ocean

title: UK to conditionally recognize Palestine as Israel turns Gaza into genocide camp
byline: French President Emmanuelle Macron said earlier in the week that France would unconditionally recognize Palestine
